description.value:
You grasp the mind of an undead creature and temporarily wipe it as empty as a zombie's brain. You can target any undead with your divine innate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Harm] spell, not just mindless undead. When you target one non-mindless undead creature with this spell, you can transform its effects. Instead of harm's normal effects, the target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} for 1 minute. While it is stupefied, you can use your Corpse Tender feats on the target as though it were mindless.

Critical Failure As failure, except the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3} for 10 minutes.
